channel.title: Making npcs at slayer give exp instead of chests
channel.description: [size=14pt][font=impact][center]hey guys, i really need to fix this~~~ i wanna make slayer really challenging and for that i need to make it so that instead of clicking a stupid chest, the player kills NPCs for slayer EXP can someone just post the script or whatever e.g. ifNpcID= 41 ifNPCdead(addexp[slayer]= 50) by the way i have NO IDEA what the script is, im just trying to say what im thinking of to give you a better picture in your head of what i'm trying to say. Thanks for your help and please respond soon! [/center] [/font] [/size]
